attributes.action: Enforce cyclists to have front and back lights on pushbike, as well as helmets
attributes.additional_details: Road safety for all road users
attributes.background: Raise fines for non compliance to promote awareness of road safety

rejection.details:
Cyclists are already legally required to have white front light, red rear light, red rear reflector and amber/yellow pedal reflectors when they are cycling between sunset and sunrise. Enforcement of these rules is a matter for local police.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Make it compulsory for all ages to wear cycle helmets: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563998

We could accept a petition calling for the Government to increase fines for cycling offences, if that's what you want to happen.
